head.title: Rhyme for a Child Viewing a Naked Venus in a Painting of 'The Judgement of Paris'
head.toctitle: Rhyme for a Child Viewing a Naked Venus in a Painting of 'The Judgement of Paris'
head.indextitle: Rhyme for a Child Viewing a Naked Venus in a Painting of 'The Judgement of Paris'
head.firstline: He gazed and gazed and gazed and gazed

notes.note: Det store indtastningsarbejde er foretaget af Brian Bentsen efter Robert Browning, The Poems, eds. John Pettigrew & Thomas J. Collins, 2 vols., Yale University Press 1981, vol. 2, s. 958.

pictures.picture: Peter Paul Rubens (1577 - 1640): The Judgement of Paris, ca. 1597-1599, olie på lærred, 144,8×193,7cm. The National Gallery, London.

poem.body: He gazed and gazed and gazed and gazed, Amazed, amazed, amazed, amazed.
